feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: I hate to borrow as much as mother does, and I knew Aunt March would croak; she always does, if you ask for a ninepence.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: He rather stared, at first, as if he wasn't used to having girls bounce into his shop and ask him to buy their hair.

causedBy.name: Asking the barber to buy her hair

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: I hate to borrow as much as mother does, and I knew Aunt March would croak; she always does, if you ask for a ninepence.

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: That's my contribution towards making father comfortable and bringing him home!

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: It almost seemed as if I'd an arm or a leg off.

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: I shall go at once, but it may be too late. O children, children, help me to bear it!

causedBy.name: Receiving a telegram about her husband's illness

feels.name: Gratitude
feels.quote: How kind you all are! Mother will accept, I'm sure; and it will be such a relief to know that she has some one to take care of her.

causedBy.name: Mr. Brooke offering to escort her to Washington

Places.name: Barber's shop
Places.description: Where Jo had her hair cut off

Places.name: At home
Places.description: Where Mrs. March received the telegram and made preparations

Events.name: Asking the barber to buy her hair
Receiving a telegram about her husband's illness
Mr. Brooke offering to escort her to Washington
